unnormalised: Hey guys! Training regimens, right? My coach, Dr. Sharma, pushes us hard. We run 5 km every morning near Marine Drive. It's brutal! Heard PV Sindhu trains at a badminton academy spanning 8000 sq ft. Plus, the cost of her protein supplements must be like Rs. 50,000 a month! Dedication, dedication, dedication! It is like eating jalebi, right?
